ygData.subject: Thanks
ygData.msgSnippet: Hey thanks for the feedback. I look forward to signing on!What is the story behind this game? (I know some might say Read the box but actually, I got the
ygData.messageBody:
Hey thanks for the feedback. I look forward to signing on!What is
the story behind this game? (I know some might say "Read the box"
but actually, I got the first CD in for 10.99 in a bargain bin at a
Game Stop) Are there enemies? Or other players enemies? What is the
benefit to joining a guild?

Gabriel

ps: this is definitely a stupid question, but are there like city
locales in which maybe a thief might try to pickpocket etc? That's
one thing I used to love to do in the Baldur Gate series in the
larger cities.
